text: Ephraim Katzir ( Efrayim Katsir; 16 May 1916 â€“ 30 May 2009) was an Israeli biophysicist and Israeli Labor Party politician. He was the fourth President of Israel from 1973 until 1978. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Presidents of Israel Category:Israeli physicists Category:Biophysicists Category:Politicians from Kyiv
